          <title>
            <string language="en">Forces  between currents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte zwischen Strömen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces entre les courants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças entre correntes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze fra le correnti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις μεταξύ των ρευμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas entre las corrientes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set-up for observing the forces between currents flowing through two aluminium foil strips.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aluminium foil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric currents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic fields</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Installation für das 
Beobachten der Kräfte zwischen den Strömen, die zwei 
Aluminiumfoliestreifen durchfließen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation pour 
observer les forces entre les courants traversant deux bandes de 
papier d'aluminium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação para 
observar as forças entre as correntes que correm através de duas 
tiras da folha de alumínio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che una messa a punto
per l'osservazione delle forze fra le correnti che attraversano 
l'alluminio due sventa le strisce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση για την 
παρατήρηση των δυνάμεων μεταξύ των ρευμάτων που διατρέχουν δύο 
λουρίδων φύλλων αλουμινίου αλουμινίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición para 
observar las fuerzas entre las corrientes que atraviesan dos tiras del
papel de aluminio.</string>
          </description>
